title: World Engineering Day for Sustainable Development 2025
description: The Electronic Systems Research Center opened its doors for an informative open house as part of the World Engineering Day for Sustainable Development. alt: Engineering Students from various courses exploring and learning about what ESRC is - Electronic Systems Research Center (Batangas State University The NEU)

title: STM32 Hackathon 2025
description: As part of the celebration for the World Engineering DayË spearheaded by the Electronic Systems Research Center (ESRC)Ë Center for Innovation in Engineering Education (CIEE)Ë Future ElectronicsË and STMicroelectronics Inc.Ë students from various fields tested their wits in the STM32 Hackathon. alt: Students from various fields and campus gathered to test their wits in creating innovative solutions using the new STM32 Processor - Electronic Systems Research Center (Batangas State University The NEU)
